article_title: Is Your Tax Return Audit Proof? Why It May Not Matter

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: IRS audit rates have dropped, especially for high income taxpayers. But before you celebrate, remember that someone is still getting audited. Plan ahead, keep good documentation, and try to make your return pristine.
og.title: Is Your Tax Return Audit Proof? Why It May Not Matter
